description: Numbers that are the sum of 4 nonzero squares in 8 or more ways.
links: Index entries for sequences related to sums of squares
mathematica: selQ[n_] := Length[ Select[ PowersRepresentations[n, 4, 2], Times @@ # != 0 &]] >= 8; Select[ Range[300], selQ] (* _Jean-Fran√ßois Alcover_, Oct 03 2013 *)
author: _David W. Wilson_
